FAQ / Custom Cards / Team Bayformers / Wave BFA World|Strike / Battle Cards /
NOTE: This card is a part of a custom card set; it is not an official Wizards of the Coast TF:TCG card.

Are These Wires Important?

  1. Are These Wires Important? [Source: BFA World|Strike]
    As of this (FAQ's) writing, the only characters in the abilities box that are relevant to play either with cards in the official game or cards created by Team Bayformers are the following:

    • Beasts (introduced in Wave 4)

    • Dinobots (Wave 1)

    • Firecons (Wave 3)

    • Trypticon (Wave 4)
